situation.title: Outside seating, terraces, indoor gardens
situation.meta_description: Rules for operation of outside seating, terraces and indoor gardens durring the pandemic time.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Outside seating, terraces, indoor gardens in restaurant facilities can stay open. The same rules as for the restaurants have to be followed. The can be opened between 10 PM and 6 AM.

All guests must be seated with a maximum capacity filled to 50% of the establishment. One table can be occupied by a maximum of 4 persons. If they are members of the same household, more people are allowed.

Guests who did not enter together as a group have to respect a 2-meter distance from each other. 

The total occupancy may not exceed 50% of the area.

update.processed:
• Outside seating, terraces, indoor gardens of restaurants will not be available.
  • Only takeout windows will be open from 5am to 10:59pm.
  • Restaurants at accommodation services can stay open for their guests also from 5 am to 10:59 pm.

Specific rules and measures will be officially released at the press conference of the government, in which PES 4 is declared.
